com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes

Class ColumnLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes.Layout
      • com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes.ColumnLayout

  • public final class ColumnLayout
extends Layout
    Defines a column-based layout for the boxes on a work area panel.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ColumnLayout.ChangeDetector
      Drag handler for detecting changes to the layout.
      static class  ColumnLayout.Column
      Represents a column in the layout.
